how would you describe your main use cas: Note-taking;Journalling;Task and project management (including CRMs);As a knowledge base (including technical, non-fiction and encyclopaedic content)
do you share your tiddlywiki(s) with oth: No, but I may export content into other formats and share individual tiddlers, the whole wiki, or an extract of the wiki
putting it all together, what value does: Memory forgets.  TiddlyWiki keeps everything I need easy to recall and use.  I have about 1,000 notes and multiples backups!
what is your level of ability with tiddl: I have customised TiddlyWiki through options and plugins;I am comfortable using WikiText widgets (e.g. <$transclude>, <$list>...);I am comfortable writing filter expressions
as you selected diy, would be grateful f: I wrote a bash script doing incremental backups rotating every 30 days (rsync) on a different host on my intranet.
